body_html: @vadimkantorov I see. But that is not easy to do in this PR, especially now that I moved away from using SIGALRM due to concerns raised by @apaszke . I think adding another thread to data loader will solve it, but I'm not sure if it is necessary. :) I'll keep this in mind, thanks for bringing it up!

body: @vadimkantorov I see. But that is not easy to do in this PR, especially now that I moved away from using SIGALRM due to concerns raised by @apaszke . I think adding another thread to data loader will solve it, but I'm not sure if it is necessary. :) I'll keep this in mind, thanks for bringing it up!
